]]
**Name:** Jacques Nyka

**Site:** Site-15

**Clearance:** Level 3

**Duties:** Researcher, Project DIAMOND head, --lead vocalist and manager for [Red Act ED]-- //(Never again!)//, [http://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/wanderer-jacques-nyka-s-overdue-fees periodic Serpent's Hand liaison]

**Inter-Foundation Publications:** Nyka, Jacques. //Project DIAMOND: Securing, Containing, and Protecting in the Digital Age.// Foundation Comp. Journal. 45(09):620-626.

**Provided documentation for the following SCPs:**
* [[[SCP-2352]]] //((A Sorta-Dead Vlogger and Their Clingy Extradimensional Fan) - A rewrite of a draft by [http://www.scp-wiki.net/reject Research Assist. A. Goldsheiner] with their permission.)//
 * [http://ja.scp-wiki.net/scp-2352 Japanese] and [http://scpfoundation.ru/scp-2352 Russian] branch versions.
* [[[SCP-5042]]] //(The not so funny pages)//
 * [http://ja.scp-wiki.net/scp-5042 Japanese] branch version.
* [[[SCP-5984]]] //(WAN Shall Stand)//
 * [http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-5984 Chinese], [http://ja.scp-wiki.net/scp-5984 Japanese],[http://scpfoundation.net/scp-5984 Russian], and [http://lafundacionscp.wikidot.com/scp-5984 Spanish] branch versions.
* [[[SCP-6874]]] //(Fallen Idol)//
* [[[SCP-7061]]] //(Whiskers' Revenge)//
* [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8581|VNP-8581]]] //(Double Exposure)//
* [[[SCP-8507]]] //(You must be this tall... to DIE!)//
* [[[SCP-8791]]] //(Walk Like an Egyptian)//

**Translated documents:**
* [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-es-185 SCP-ES-185] (original writer [[*user daman_1985]])
* SCP-PL-207 (original writer [[*user Calamari_Knight]]) ([[[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-pl-207|International]]], [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-pl-207|English]]])
* [[[Bread &...]]] (original author [[*user Transcend_man]]); co-translated with [[*user MaxyFran73]]
* [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/1998-911-hub|Manhattan Crisis Hub]]] (co-translated by [[*user MaxyFran73]])
* [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/critter-profile-shigastan|Critter Profile: Shigastan]]] (original author [[*user stengan774]]; co-translated by [[*user MaxyFran73]])
* [[[SCP-2015-JP]]] (original author [[*user Okaka_Onigiri]] and [[*user Solvex]]; co translated by [[*user MaxyFran73]])
* [[[SCP-3324-JP]]] (original author [[*user Kaboom1103]]; co-translated by MaxyFran)
* [[[SCP-1741-JP]]] (original author [[*user ︎indonootoko]]; co-translated by MaxyFran)
* [[[Corpse Corpus Hub]]] (original author [[*user Kaboom1103]]; co-translated by MaxyFran)
* [[[SCP-ZH-981]]] (original author [[*user AbyssDream]]

**Miscellaneous filings:**
* [[[tifu-by-getting-a-book-from-the-library|Today I Fucked Up by getting a book from the Library]]]
 * [http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/tifu-by-getting-a-book-from-the-library Chinese] and [http://scpfoundation.net/tifu-by-getting-a-book-from-the-library Russian] branch version
* [[[yggdrasils-surveyor|Yggdrasil's Surveyor Hub]]] ([[[http://ko.scp-wiki.net/yggdrasils-surveyor|Korean version]]])
 * [[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/broken-masquerade-epistolary|Snippets of an Unveiled World]]] (in collaboration with [http://www.scp-wiki.net/the-bread-box Bannock], [http://www.scp-wiki.net/westrinsauthorpage Westrin], [http://www.scp-wiki.net/floppyphoenix Lt. Flops], and [[*user IFBench]]) (Crossover with Broken Masquerade)
  * [http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/broken-masquerade-epistolary Chinese], [http://ja.scp-wiki.net/broken-masquerade-epistolary Japanese], [http://fondazionescp.wikidot.com/broken-masquerade-epistolary Italian], [http://scp-pt-br.wikidot.com/broken-masquerade-epistolary Portuguese], and [http://lafundacionscp.wikidot.com/broken-masquerade-epistolary Spanish] branch versions
 * [[[When I Was A Child, I Had a Fever]]]
 * [[[gardeners-of-the-orchard|The Gardeners Of The Orchard]]]
 * [[[SCP-7507]]] //(Tragic Dimension Hoper)//
 * [[[Nantucket]]]
 * [[[The Escape Artist of Saint Christopher's]]]
 * [[[The Ironclad Fae]]] (Crossover with From 120's Archives)
 * [[[razing-of-the-library|The Razing of the Library]]] (Crossover with Mundus, Liberari)
 * [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/a-hopper-in-the-offshoot|Agent Hopper in... The Offshoot]]] (Crossover with The Offshoot)
* [[[mundus-liberari|Mundus, Liberari Hub]]]
 * [[[re-kto-0001-bellfather|RE: KTO-0001-Bellfather "Overwatch Council"]]] ##red|{{(Content warning: trans- and xenophobia, and fascist elements.)}}##
  * [[[http://fondazionescp.wikidot.com/re-kto-0001-bellfather|Italian translation]]]
 * [[[Patris Et Filia]]]
 * [[[SCP-8068|PPC-8068]]]
* [[[Parawatch Intro Thread]]] with [[*user Uncle Nicolini]] ##red|{{(Content warning: discussion of suicide.)}}##
* [[[tales-from-parawatch-welcome-to-the-internet|Tales From Parawatch: Welcome to the Internet, Have a Look Around]]] with [[*user Fishish]], [[*user Dr0shadow]] and [[*user LORDXVNV]]
* [[[When The Brass Played]]]
* Department of Anomalous Broadcasting:
 * [[[dab-orientation|And Now Our Feature Presentation...]]]
 * [[[parker-informational-breach|URGENT: Parker, Arizona Informational Breach]]]
* [[[Inverse Precognition]]]
* [[[JensenAleph]]]
* [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:michael-the-frend|Michael The Frend]]]
* [[[Reviver]]]
* [[[A Semi-Comprehensive List of Foundation Fronts]]] (with [[*user Ihp]])
* [[[i-went-to-hong-shing|I went to Hong Shing, and All I Got Was This Radioactive Crystal]]]
* [[[How The Time Pervert Stole Christmas]]]
* [[[Cómo Fue]]]
* [[[A Semi-Comprehensive List of Foundation Bots]]] (with [[*user A Random Treestump]] and [[*user Gabriel Kero]])

//Just to reiterate, any rumors that [Red Act ED] are planning to get back together are false. How we were able to convince the brass to even greenlight it in the first place is beyond me. The same goes for us releasing any of the music. We were barely able to perform it **live**. No. -JN//

----
Will: In the event I leave the Foundationverse communities, I give custody and full rewrite permissions of my solo works on both this wiki and the Wanderers' Library to [[*user Queerious]] indefinitely. Co-authored works are to be shared with respective co-authors.
----
